tool_description: WeatherAPI.com is a powerful fully managed free weather and geolocation API provider that provides extensive APIs that range from the weather forecast, historical weather, future weather, weather alerts, air quality data, IP lookup, and astronomy through to sports, time zone, and geolocation.
title: WeatherAPI.com

api_list.name: Realtime Weather API
api_list.description: Current weather or realtime weather API method allows a user to get up to date current weather information in json and xml. The data is returned as a Current Object.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:  Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

utterances.utterance: What's the current weather in Paris?
Show me the real-time weather for the coordinates 48.8567,2.3508.
Get the current weather for the US zip code 10001.
What's the weather right now at London Heathrow Airport using the IATA code EGLL?
Provide the current weather conditions for the UK postcode SW1.
Get the weather update for the Canadian postal code G2J.
What's the current weather based on my IP address?
Show me the real-time weather for the IP address 100.0.0.1.
Get the current weather using the METAR code for London Heathrow, metar:EGLL.
What's the weather right now in Dubai using the IATA code DXB?

api_list.name: Forecast Weather API
api_list.description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days of forecast required.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

utterances.utterance: What's the 5-day weather forecast for Paris?
Show me the weather forecast for the next 3 days in New York City.
Give me the weather forecast for London on 2024-06-15.
What's the weather forecast for the next 7 days in the postal code G2J in Canada?
Provide the weather forecast for Tokyo in Japanese for the next 4 days.
Get the weather forecast for the airport with IATA code DXB for 2 days.
What's the weather forecast for the coordinates 48.8567,2.3508 for the next 6 days?
Show me the weather forecast for the UK postcode SW1 on 2024-06-10.
Get the weather forecast for the IP address 100.0.0.1 for the next 3 days.
Provide the weather forecast for Berlin in German for 5 days.

api_list.name: Time Zone API
api_list.description: Time Zone API method allows a user to get up to date time zone and local time information in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

utterances.utterance: What is the current time zone and local time for Paris?
Can you tell me the time zone information for the coordinates 48.8567,2.3508?
Get the local time and time zone details for the US zip code 10001.
I need the time zone and local time for the UK postcode SW1.
What is the current time zone for the Canadian postal code G2J?
Provide the time zone and local time for the airport with IATA code DXB.
Check the time zone and local time based on my IP address 100.0.0.1.
What is the time zone and local time for the METAR code EGLL?
Find the time zone and local time for my current location using IP lookup.
Tell me the time zone and local time for New York City.

api_list.name: Future Weather API
api_list.description: Future weather API method returns weather in a 3 hourly interval in future for a date between 14 days and 300 days from today in the future.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: 'dt' should be between 14 days and 300 days from today in the future in yyyy-MM-dd format (i.e. dt=2023-01-01)

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

utterances.utterance: What's the weather forecast for Paris on 2024-07-15?
Show me the future weather in New York City on 2024-08-01.
Can you provide the weather forecast for the coordinates 34.0522,-118.2437 on 2024-09-10?
I want to know the weather in the UK postcode SW1 on 2024-10-05.
What's the forecast for the Canadian postal code G2J on 2024-11-20?
Give me the weather forecast for Dubai airport (IATA code DXB) on 2024-12-15.
What's the weather forecast for the IP address 100.0.0.1 on 2024-07-30?
Show me the weather forecast for London on 2024-08-25 in French.
What will the weather be like in Tokyo on 2024-09-18?
Get the future weather forecast for the METAR code EGLL on 2024-10-10.

api_list.name: Sports API
api_list.description: Sports API method allows a user to get listing of all upcoming sports events for football, cricket and golf in json.

utterances.utterance: Show me all upcoming sports events in New York.
What are the next football, cricket, and golf events happening in Mumbai?
List all upcoming sports events in London.
Can you provide the schedule of upcoming cricket matches in Sydney?
I want to see the upcoming golf tournaments in Los Angeles.
Give me the upcoming football games in Paris.
What sports events are scheduled soon in Tokyo?
Find all upcoming cricket, football, and golf events in Toronto.
List the upcoming sports events in Berlin.
Show me the next sports events happening in Dubai.

api_list.name: History Weather API
api_list.description: History weather API method returns historical weather for a date on or after 1st Jan, 2010 (depending upon subscription level) as json.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: For history API 'dt' should be on or after 1st Jan, 2010 in yyyy-MM-dd format

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: Restricting history output to a specific hour in a given day.

parameters.name: end_dt
parameters.description: Restrict date output for History API method. Should be on or after 1st Jan, 2010. Make sure end_dt is equal to or greater than 'dt'.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

utterances.utterance: What was the weather like in New York on 2022-05-15?
Show me the historical weather for Paris on 2019-12-01.
Get the weather history for the coordinates 48.8567,2.3508 on 2021-07-20.
What was the weather in London on 2018-03-10 at 14:00?
Provide historical weather data for the US zip code 10001 on 2020-11-05.
Show me the weather history for Tokyo from 2023-01-01 to 2023-01-07.
What was the weather like at the airport with IATA code DXB on 2022-08-15?
Get the historical weather for the UK postcode SW1 on 2017-09-30 in French.
Show the weather history for Canada postal code G2J on 2016-06-20.
What was the weather for IP address 100.0.0.1 on 2021-04-10?

api_list.name: IP Lookup API
api_list.description: IP Lookup API method allows a user to get up to date information for an IP address in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
e.g: q=auto:ip

IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the location details for the IP address 192.168.1.1?
Lookup the IP address 8.8.8.8 and tell me the current information.
Get the geolocation data for the IP 2607:f8b0:4005:805::200e.
Find the IP lookup details for 123.45.67.89.
Show me the IP lookup information for the IP address 172.217.3.110.

Get me the details for the IP address 192.0.2.146.
Lookup the IP 100.64.0.1 and return the current info.
Retrieve the IP lookup information for the IPv6 address 2001:4860:4860::8888.

api_list.name: Astronomy API
api_list.description: Astronomy API method allows a user to get up to date information for sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset, moon phase and illumination in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris

UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

Provide moonrise and moonset times for the METAR code EGLL on 2024-09-10.
